com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.voice

Class MapboxSpeechPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.voice.MapboxSpeechPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InstructionPlayer

    public class MapboxSpeechPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements InstructionPlayer

    Will retrieve synthesized speech mp3s from Mapbox's API Voice.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isMuted() 
      void onDestroy()
      Used to stop and release the media (if needed).
      void onOffRoute()
      Used in off-route scenarios to stop current instruction (if playing) and voice a rerouting cue.
      void play(java.lang.String instruction)
      Plays the specified text instruction using MapboxSpeech API, defaulting to SSML input type
      void setMuted(boolean isMuted)
      Will determine if voice instructions will be played or not.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Specified by:

      • isMuted

        public boolean isMuted()
        Specified by:
        isMuted in interface InstructionPlayer
        Returns:
        true if currently muted, false if not

      • setMuted

        public void setMuted(boolean isMuted)
        Description copied from interface: InstructionPlayer
        Will determine if voice instructions will be played or not.

        If called while an instruction is currently playing, the instruction should end immediately and any instructions queued should be cleared.

        Specified by:
        setMuted in interface InstructionPlayer
        Parameters:
        isMuted - true if should be muted, false if should not

      • onOffRoute

        public void onOffRoute()
        Description copied from interface: InstructionPlayer
        Used in off-route scenarios to stop current instruction (if playing) and voice a rerouting cue.
        Specified by:
        onOffRoute in interface InstructionPlayer

        Description copied from interface: InstructionPlayer
